text: 1.4 The Local Plan, together with the London Plan and Neighbourhood Plans, will form the statutory Development Plan framework for Tower Hamlets and be used to assess all planning applications. 1.5 The process of development a Local Plan starts with engaging the community which the council commenced in January 2023. Reflecting on the submissions received through early engagement a Regulation 18 draft Local Plan was consulted upon in late 2023. The updated version of the Local Plan which considers submissions received at Regulation 18 is the Regulation 19 Local Plan. This updated version of the document is submitted to the Secretary of State under Regulation 19, alongside any final comments or ‘representations’. If the Secretary of State deems the document to meet the basic legal requirements, an Independent Inspector will be appointed to undertake and examination in public of the draft Local Plan. 8 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS
